sentences.en: A couple of inches of dry, powdery snow had fallen.
sentences.cn: 下了数英寸厚的粉状干雪。

sentences.en: Dorothy, come on. Never mind your shoes. They'll soon dry off.
sentences.cn: 快点儿吧，多萝西。别去管你的鞋子了，它们很快就会干的。

sentences.en: Dry hair can be damaged by washing it too frequently.
sentences.cn: 干性头发洗得太频繁容易受损。

sentences.en: experiments have so far come up dry.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，实验仍未成功。

sentences.en: Government reports tend to make dry reading.
sentences.cn: 政府报告读起来往往枯燥无味。

sentences.en: he intends to dry out and get his life back together again.
sentences.cn: 他想要戒酒，并再次恢复有条有理的生活。

sentences.en: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.cn: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.en: In schools, science is often presented in a dry and uninteresting manner.
sentences.cn: 在学校里，科学往往用枯燥乏味的方式来讲授。

sentences.en: Investment could dry up and that could cause the economy to falter.
sentences.cn: 投资可能会中断，而这会引起经济衰退。

sentences.en: Let's dry our hair so we don't catch cold.
sentences.cn: 我们把头发吹干，这样就不会感冒。

sentences.en: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.cn: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.en: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
sentences.cn: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

sentences.en: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 杀了猪，猪腿挂在天花板上风干。

sentences.en: She took a sip of water to moisten her dry throat.
sentences.cn: 她抿了一口水，润一下发干的喉咙。

sentences.en: Such cars, however, do grip the road well, even in the dry.
sentences.cn: 不过，这种车即使在干燥路面上也表现出了良好的抓地性能。

sentences.en: Symptoms included frequent dryness in the mouth.
sentences.cn: 症状包括经常口干。

sentences.en: The aquifer which had once fed the wells was pronounced dry.
sentences.cn: 曾为水井供水的蓄水层正式宣告干涸了。

sentences.en: The cold winds dry out your skin very quickly.
sentences.cn: 冷风很快会把你的皮肤吹干。

sentences.en: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.cn: 这条小道很干燥。

sentences.en: The path was dry and slithery from the drought.
sentences.cn: 小路因干旱变得又干又滑。

sentences.en: There were few dry eyes in the house when I finished.
sentences.cn: 我说完后房间里没几个人不掉泪的。

sentences.en: Three days into production, the kitty had run dry.
sentences.cn: 才投产3天凑集的钱就用光了。

sentences.en: We were glad to be on dry land again.
sentences.cn: 再一次踏上陆地我们很高兴。

sentences.en: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.cn: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

words.tran_cn: 干燥地；冷淡地；枯燥无味地
烘干机；[助剂] 干燥剂

phrases.tran_cn: [化]干气（如含甲烷和乙烷的天然气）
搁浅；孤立无援；处于困境
在干的地方；在不受雨淋的地方

phrases.phrase: there wasn't a dry eye (in the house)
phrases.tran_cn: （观看戏剧、电影等）观众没有不掉眼泪的

trans.tran_cn: 干（燥）的，干旱的，冷淡的，枯竭的，枯燥的
trans.tran_en: without water or liquid inside or on the surface
to make something dry, or to become dry
